permissions: User must be authorized for the production measurement via the associated job_production_plan_segment (delegated policy).
side_effects: Updates a production measurement. When all calculation inputs are present, saving updates the related job_production_plan_segment quantity and quantity_per_hour.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (production measurement ID). At least one attribute flag must be provided. width-display-unit-of-measure must be inches or feet when provided. pass-count must be greater than 0 when provided. width-inches, depth-inches, length-feet, speed-feet-per-minute, speed-feet-per-minute-possible, and density-lbs-per-cubic-foot must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --width-inches
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --depth-inches
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --length-feet
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --speed-feet-per-minute
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --speed-feet-per-minute-possible
flags.description: Possible speed in feet per minute.
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --density-lbs-per-cubic-foot
flags.description: Density in lbs per cubic foot.
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --pass-count
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.
